text: Edge can mean: *In geometry, an edge is where two surfaces meet. *In graph theory, an edge is a connection between two nodes (or vertices) *In geology, it describes an escarpment *It can stand for Enhanced Data Rate for GSM Evolution. This is a way to make mobile phones transmit data faster than with GSM *Microsoft Edge, an internet browser. *Edge (magazine), a UK video game magazine. *The Edge (born 1961), Irish musician, member of U2 *Edge (wrestler) (born 1973), ring name of Canadian professional wrestler Adam Copeland. Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Edge
